# Dropdown Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Default

**Variants:**

| Variant Name | Class |
|--------------|-------|
| Vertical | `dropdown  dropdown-menu` |
| Horizontal | `dropdown  dropdown-menu horizontal` |
